price: Siapakah yang mau meminjamkan kepada Allah pinjaman yang baik, maka Allah akan melipat-gandakan (balasan) pinjaman itu untuknya, dan dia akan memperoleh pahala yang banyak,
arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man dhā alladhī yuq'riḍu al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan fayuḍāʿifahu lahu walahu ajrun karīmun
